author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Hyte Y70 Case on Amazon https://geni.us/p2lWP
Hardware news this past week has been slammed: Intel launched its B580 GPU in the Arc 'Battlemage' series, which has been widely received as a successful product launch for the company. Alongside this, Intel has a healthy mix of partner models this time, which we round-up in this video. Those include ASRock, Acer, Gunnir, Sparkle, and others. Additionally, we cover SteamOS branding guidelines appearing for third-party devices in a promising glimpse at a future of more non-Windows devices. Thermal Grizzly launched putty, Arctic launched an interesting passive under-desk PC, trade issues continue for China and the US, and more.

Check out Der8auer's charity drive video! Only goes through tomorrow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eJ8jyA59jKM

The best way to support our work is through our store: https://store.gamersnexus.net/

Like our content? Please consider becoming our Patron to support us: http://www.patreon.com/gamersnexus

T
title: HW News - Intel's B580 Victory, SteamOS Growing, NVIDIA Blackwell US Manufacturing Rumor
